text: The Long Good Friday is a 1980 British crime movie. It is set in London. It was directed by John Mackenzie and written by Barrie Keeffe. It stars Bob Hoskins as gangster Harold Shand and Helen Mirren as Victoria. == Other websites == * Category:1980 crime drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Gangster movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Belfast Category:1980 mystery movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Mackenzie Category:Movies about the Irish Republican Army
title: The Long Good Friday
